memories.content: We first met on a beautiful spring day. The moment I saw you, I knew you were special.
I call her Sunshine because she brightens every moment of my life.
Her favorite color is purple and she loves chocolate ice cream. She also adores romantic comedies.
Our first date was at the Italian restaurant downtown. We talked for hours about everything and nothing.
We stayed up all night stargazing and talking about our dreams. She pointed out Orion's belt.
She loves listening to indie music and her favorite artist is Cigarettes After Sex.
We have this inside joke about pineapple on pizza - she's team yes, I'm team no.
I promised to always be there for her, no matter what. She deserves the world.
